product.name: Plug-In Switch
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, indoor, module, control, outlet, plug, switch, energy, 120, volt, 15, amp, power, zwave, 12719

step1.text: Plug the indoor switch into the outlet where you intend to use it.

step2.text: To pair your indoor switch, press the button on the front of it. The hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: Plug-In Outdoor Switch
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, outdoor, module, control, outlet, plug, switch, energy, 120, volt, power, waterproof, zwave, 45635, 12720

step1.text: Plug the outdoor switch into the outlet where you intend to use it.

step2.text: To pair your outdoor switch, press the button on the front of it. The hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: Plug-In Dimmer
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, indoor, module, control, outlet, plug, switch, energy, 120, volt, 15, amp, power, zwave, 12718

step1.text: Plug the indoor dimmer into the outlet where you intend to use it.

step2.text: To pair your indoor dimmer, press the button on the front of it. The hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: Light Switch
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, indoor, control, in, wall, switch, energy, 120, volt, power, zwave, 45637, 45609, 45638, 12722

step1.text: Install the switch as described in the printed instructions included with your device.

step2.text: To pair your light switch, press the top of the rocker switch once. The hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: Electrical Outlet
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, indoor, control, in, wall, outlet, plug, switch, energy, duplex, receptacle, 120, volt, power, zwave, 45636, 12721

step1.text: Install the outlet as described in the printed instructions included with your device.

step2.text: To pair your outlet, press the button on the front once. The hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: Dimmer Switch
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, indoor, control, in, wall, switch, dimmer, energy, 120, volt, 15 amp, power, zwave, 45639, 45612, 12724

step1.text: Install the dimmer as described in the printed instructions included with your device.

step2.text: To pair your dimmer switch, press the top of the rocker switch once. The hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: Fan Switch
product.keywords: GE, Jasco, indoor, control, in, wall, switch, fan, 120, volt, power, zwave, 12485, 12730

step1.text: Install the fan switch as described in the printed instructions included with your device.

step2.text: To pair your fan switch, press the top of the rocker switch once. The hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: Water Leak Detector
product.keywords: Utilitech, Everspring, indoor, water, leak, flood, sensor, safety, zwave, battery

step1.text: Remove screw, slide and lift off face plate.

step2.text: Next remove screw and lift battery cover

step3.text: Insert batteries then press the button. The Iris hub will beep when it has been paired successfully

product.name: Smoke Detector
product.keywords: First, Alert, smoke, fire, detector, sensor, safety, alarm, indoor, zwave, battery

step1.text: Slide battery drawer open.

step2.text: Insert batteries checking the correct orientation.

step3.text: Press and hold the test button. Keep it held down as you slide the battery drawer closed, then release the button. The Iris hub will beep when the detector has paired successfully.

product.name: Smoke & CO Detector
product.keywords: First, Alert, smoke, CO, carbon monoxide, fire, detector, sensor, safety, alarm, indoor, zwave, battery

step1.text: Slide battery drawer open.

step2.text: Insert batteries checking the correct orientation.

step3.text: Press and hold the test button. Keep it held down as you slide the battery drawer closed, then release the button. The Iris hub will beep when detector has paired successfully.

product.name: Touch Screen Thermostat
product.keywords: Honeywell, indoor, thermostat, programmable, 7, day, touchscreen, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner, zwave, zwave, battery

step1.text: Install the thermostat as instructed in the printed manual and set the correct time and date. Press the 'System' button. Press and hold both indicated keys until the thermostat screen changes to show up / down arrows.

step2.text: Press the leftmost down arrow until the screen shows 'rf10'. Use the rightmost arrows to select '1'. The thermostat is now in pairing mode. The hub will beep when the thermostat has been successfully paired.

step3.text: You now need to enable the 'Auto' thermostat setting. Use the leftmost arrows to select '0300'. Use the rightmost arrows to select '1'. Now press the 'DONE' button in the bottom left corner of the thermostat screen. You can now remotely control your thermostat through Iris!

product.name: Programmable Thermostat
product.keywords: Iris, GoControl, indoor, thermostat, programmable, 7, day, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner, zwave, battery

step1.text: Install the thermostat as described in the printed instructions included with your device.

step2.text: Hold the FAN button until the screen changes to the SETUP screen. Press the UP button until the ZWAVE is shown on the status line, press Select. INSTALL should be shown on the status line, press SELECT.

step3.text: When SUCCESS is shown on the status line, press DONE to exit the ZWAVE screen and press DONE again to exit the SETUP screen. The Iris hub will beep when it has been paired successfully. Once pairing is complete, you can program your thermostat using the Iris app.

product.name: Lever Lock
product.keywords: Schlage, Camelot, Century, Plymouth, door, lever, lock, entry, keypad, zwave, FE599IR, battery

step1.text: Make a note of the 6 digit program code from sticker on the inside of the lock or included in your lock installation instructions before you install it. Then follow the printed instructions to install your lock into your door.

step2.text: Ensure your lock has the batteries properly installed. Enter the six digit program code. Wait for the Schlage button to flash and beep three times.

step3.text: Press the Schlage button once. Then press the number 0. The Hub will beep when it has been paired successfully. Once pairing is complete you can control who has PIN access to your lock using the Iris app.

product.name: Touchscreen Deadbolt
product.keywords: Schlage, Camelot, Century, Plymouth, door, deadbolt, lock, touchscreen, BE469IR, BE469NX, entry, zwave, battery

step1.text: Follow the printed instructions to install your Deadbolt into your door. Make note of the 6 digit program code from the sticker on the inside of the lock.

step2.text: Ensure your lock has the batteries properly installed. Press the Schlage button and then enter the 6 digit program code. The orange light will begin to flash slowly.

step3.text: Press the number 0 once. The hub will beep and the green check mark will illuminate when the lock has been paired successfully. Once pairing is complete you can control who has PIN access to your lock using the Iris app.

product.name: Keypad Deadbolt
product.keywords: Schlage, Camelot, Century, Plymouth, door, deadbolt, lock, BE369IR, entry, keypad, zwave, battery

step1.text: Make a note of the 6 digit program code from sticker on the inside of the lock or included in your lock installation instructions before you install it. Then follow the printed instructions to install your lock into your door.

step2.text: Ensure your lock has the batteries properly installed. Enter the six digit program code. Wait for the Schlage button to flash and beep three times.

step3.text: Press the Schlage button once. Then press the number 0. The Hub will beep when it has been paired successfully. Once pairing is complete you can control who has PIN access to your lock using the Iris app.

product.name: SmartCode Lever Lock
product.keywords: Kwikset, smartcode, smartkey, key, smart, code, door, lever, lock, keypad, entry, zwave, battery

step1.text: Install the lock as instructed in the printed manual.

step2.text: Remove the cover from the lock on the inside of the door. Press the indicated button on the lock once. The Iris hub will beep when it has been paired successfully. Once pairing is complete you can control who has PIN access to your lock using the Iris app.

product.name: SmartCode Deadbolt
product.keywords: Kwikset, smartcode, smartkey, key, smart, code, door, deadbolt, lock, keypad, entry, zwave, battery

step1.text: Install the lock as instructed in the printed manual.

step2.text: Remove the cover from the lock on the inside of the door. Press the indicated button on the lock once. The Iris hub will beep when it has been paired successfully. Once pairing is complete you can control who has PIN access to your lock using the Iris app.

product.name: BR30 LED Flood Light
product.keywords: Sylvania, LED, flood, light, bulb, BR30, dimmable, 65, watt, zigbee, iQ

step1.text: Turn off the power to the light first then screw the LED light bulb into the fitting.

step2.text: Turn on power to the light. When the LED bulb has paired successfully the Iris hub will beep and the LED bulb will flash 3 times. LED Light Bulbs can only be added to Iris 8, or fewer, at a time. To add more than 8, first finish this installation, then start the pairing processes again by clicking 'add devices'.

product.name: Door and Window Sensor
product.keywords: CentraLite, Iris, contact, temperature door, window, sensor, zigbee, security, alarm, battery

product.name: Motion Sensor
product.keywords: CentraLite, Iris, motion, PIR, infrared, passive, sensor, zigbee, security, alarm, indoor, battery

product.name: Smart Button
product.keywords: CentraLite, Iris, smart, panic, button, doorbell, zigbee, indoor, control, battery

product.name: Smart Plug
product.keywords: CentraLite, Iris, indoor, module, control, outlet, smart, plug, switch, energy, 120, volt, power, zigbee

product.name: Security Keypad
product.keywords: CentraLite, Iris, smart, zigbee, security, safety, panic, alarm, keypad, indoor, battery

product.name: Smart Fob
product.keywords: CentraLite, Iris, smart, key, fob, button, control, arm, disarm, zigbee, indoor, presence, battery

product.name: Care Pendant
product.keywords: CentraLite, Iris, senior, pendant, panic, indoor, zigbee, battery, care, safety, presence

product.name: Touch Screen Thermostat
product.keywords: Iris, indoor, thermostat, humidity, fan, control, programmable, 7, day, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner, zwave, CT, 101, battery

step1.text: Install the thermostat as described in the printed instructions included with your device.

step2.text: Press the Menu button, then press 'Mate' on the screen. Next press 'Mate' again and the word 'Mate' will flash on the display. Once the thermostat is paired the LINK icon will flash and the Hub will beep.

product.name: Hose Faucet Timer
product.keywords: irrigation, hose, timer, zigbee, Orbit, faucet, water, sprinkler, lawn, grass, plants, outdoor, ht8, battery

step1.text: Squeeze the tabs on the back of controller and slide out the battery drawer.

step2.text: Insert batteries into the drawer taking care to orient them properly. Slide the drawer back into the controller

step3.text: Set the dial to 'Auto'. The antenna icon will flash while the controller is paring with Iris and then remain solid. The hub will beep once paring is complete.

product.name: 12 Station Irrigation Timer
product.keywords: Orbit, irrigation, timer, zigbee, yard, grass lawn, outdoor, sprkinler, water, wt15

step1.text: Install the controller as shown in the printed manual. Connect the power. Turn the dial to 'auto' and then swing the front panel open.

step2.text: Press the indicated button on the back of the panel and then close the panel.

step3.text: The antenna icon will flash while the controller is pairing. Once complete the controller will display 'SMART MODE' and your smart hub will beep.

product.name: Garage Door Controller
product.keywords: Linear, Iris, zwave, garage, door, takeover, controller, barrier, security, lock

step1.text: Plug your Iris Garage Door Opener into an electrical outlet. Do not connect it to your garage door motor yet.

step2.text: Press the Link button on the side of the Iris Garage Door Opener once. The Iris hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

step3.text: Mount your Iris Garage Door Opener and connect it to your Garage Door motor, as instructed in the user manual. You will also need to install the included Tilt Sensor onto your garage door. Once installed, sync the door status by opening or closing your garage door once using your existing remote.

product.name: Garage Door Controller
product.keywords: NuTone, Iris, zwave, garage, door, takeover, controller, barrier, security, lock

step1.text: Plug your garage door controller into an electrical outlet. Do not connect it to your garage door motor yet.

step2.text: Press the Link button on the side of the garage door opener once. The Iris hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

step3.text: Mount your garage door opener and connect it to your garage door motor, as instructed in the user manual. You will also need to install the included tilt sensor onto your garage door. Once installed, sync the door status by opening or closing your garage door once using your existing remote.

product.name: Glass Break Sensor
product.keywords: Utilitech, Linear, glassbreak, glass, break, alarm, security, zwave, battery

step1.text: Install the glass break sensor as described in the printed instructions. Insert the included batteries.

step2.text: Press the button on the glass break sensor once. An LED on the glass break sensor will begin to flash.

step3.text: The LED will flash until it has been paired with Iris. The hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: Water Shut-Off Valve
product.keywords: Waxman, Leak Smark, water, shut, off, insurance, zigbee, leak, flow, battery

step1.text: Pull the enclosure off the valve. The enclosure can be powered using the adapter or batteries. If both are used the batteries provide back-up power.

step2.text: Use a screw driver to remove the battery cover. Lift out the battery drawer and insert 4 batteries, replace the battery drawer and cover. To power the valve with AC power, connect the plug to the socket on the base of the device and plug into a power outlet.

step3.text: Push the enclosure back onto the valve. The blue LED will flash until it has been paired with Iris. The Iris hub will beep when it has paired successfully. Install the valve as instructed in the printed guide.

product.name: Tilt Sensor
product.keywords: Nyce, tilt, sensor, garage, alarm, security, zigbee, battery

step1.text: Slide open the tilt sensor's cover.

step2.text: Insert a battery and remove the plastic battery guard. An LED will flash until the tilt sensor has paired successfully, and then the Iris hub will beep.

step3.text: Once pairing is complete, replace the cover by sliding it onto the sensor. Install the tilt sensor with the groove vertical and on the right-hand side, as shown in the image above.

product.name: Door Hinge Sensor
product.keywords: Nyce, hinge, sensor, alarm, security, zigbee, battery, door, contact

step1.text: Position the Door Hinge Sensor near the final installation location. Pull the plastic battery tab located on the back-side slot of the Door Hinge Sensor.

step2.text: The LED on the front-side of the sensor will show a sequence of yellow – red – yellow. This indicates it is ready for pairing with Iris. During the pairing process, the LED on the front-side of the sensor will show a sequence of yellow – green – yellow.

step3.text: Once paired the LED on the sensor will flash green three times and the Iris Hub will beep. Please now mount the Door Hinge Sensor to the door according to the printed installation guide. If the Door Hinge Sensor does not update its status as "Closed" when you close your door, please consult your printed installation guide.

product.name: 85-Decibels Indoor Siren
product.keywords: Utilitech, Everspring, siren, 85, decibel, alarm, security, zwave, sound, battery

step1.text: Loosen screw then slide and lift the cover.

step2.text: Insert batteries checking the correct orientation.

step3.text: Press the button. The Iris hub will beep when it has been paired successfully.

product.name: Contact Sensor
product.keywords: AlertMe, Iris, contact, temperature, door, window, sensor, zigbee, security, alarm, battery, DWS901

step1.text: Squeeze both sides together on the semi-circles and then pull off the back cover.

step2.text: Insert the battery on top of the battery tab, checking correct orientation. The black dots are to help you orient the sensor correctly when you install it.

step3.text: Replace cover ensuring that the tabs are aligned. The light on the sensor will flash until it has been paired to Iris (the hub will beep).

product.name: Motion Sensor
product.keywords: AlertMe, Iris, motion, PIR, infrared, passive, sensor, zigbee, security, alarm, indoor, battery, MOT501

step1.text: Squeeze both sides together on the raised edges and then pull off the back cover.

step2.text: Insert battery on top of the battery tab, checking correct orientation.

step3.text: Ensure the tabs are aligned as you replace the cover. The light will flash until it has been paired to Iris (the Hub will beep).

product.name: Smart Button
product.keywords: AlertMe, Iris, smart, panic, button, doorbell, zigbee, indoor, control, battery, BTN900

step1.text: Squeeze both sides together on the raised edges and then pull off the back cover

step2.text: Insert battery on top of the battery tab, checking correct orientation.

step3.text: Ensure the tabs are aligned as you replace the cover. The light may flash until it has been paired to Iris (the Hub will beep).

product.name: Key Fob
product.keywords: AlertMe, Iris, smart, keyfob, key, fob, button, control, arm, disarm, zigbee, indoor, presence, battery, KEY903

step1.text: Insert the supplied access tool into the small opening at the top of the key fob. Use the tool as a lever to open the key fob.

step2.text: Insert battery checking correct orientation.

step3.text: Slide the thin end together, and then squeeze the key fob closed. The key fob will flash until it has been paired to Iris (the hub will beep).

product.name: Plug-In Switch
product.keywords: AlertMe, Iris, indoor, module, control, outlet, smart, plug, switch, energy, 120, volt, power, zigbee, SPG902

step1.text: Plug the Smart Plug into an outlet that is no more than 10 feet from your hub in order to pair it (you can move it after pairing).

step2.text: The light on the front of the Smart Plug will flash until it has been paired to Iris. Once this occurs (the hub will beep), feel free to move the plug to your preferred outlet.

product.name: Security Keypad
product.keywords: AlertMe, Iris, smart, zigbee, security, safety, panic, alarm, keypad, key, pad, battery, KDP901

step1.text: Remove the back of the keypad using a screwdriver.

step2.text: Insert the batteries checking correct orientation and then close the cover.

step3.text: The ""On"" light will flash until it has been paired to Iris. Once this occurs the hub will beep, feel free to install the keypad in its preferred location.

product.name: Care Pendant
product.keywords: AlertMe, Iris, senior, pendant, panic, indoor, zigbee, battery, care, safety, presence, PDT900

step1.text: Insert the supplied access tool into the small opening at the top of the pendant. Use the tool as a lever to open the pendant.

step2.text: Insert battery on top of the battery tab, checking correct orientation.

step3.text: Slide the thin ends together, and then squeeze the pendant closed. The pendant will flash until it has been paired to Iris (the Smart Hub will beep).

product.name: Vent
product.keywords: Keen, vent, fan, control, climate, hvac, heater, air, conditioner, zigbee, battery

product.name: Touchscreen Lever Lock
product.keywords: Yale, real, living, door, lever, lock, touchscreen, YRL220, entry, zwave, battery

step1.text: Install the lock as instructed in the printed manual and change the master PIN so that it is 5 or more numbers long. Do not use your Iris PIN as a master PIN.

step2.text: Touch the keypad with your palm to activate it. Next enter the master PIN then press #. The 'P key' will turn red. Next press '7 #'.

step3.text: Press '1 #' to add the lock to Iris. The lock and Smart hub will beep when it has been paired successfully. To more easily manage who has PIN access to your locks, create a new Iris contact (Premium service required)

product.name: Touchscreen Deadbolt
product.keywords: Yale, real, living, door, deadbolt, lock, touchscreen, YRD220, entry, zwave, battery

step1.text: Install the lock as instructed in the printed manual and change the master PIN so that it is 5 or more numbers long. Do not use your Iris PIN as a master PIN.

step2.text: Touch the keypad with your palm to activate it. Next enter the master PIN then press #. The 'P key' will turn red. Next press '7 #'.

step3.text: Press '1 #' to add the lock to Iris. The lock will announce its success and the Smart hub will beep. To more easily manage who has PIN access to your locks, create a new Iris contact (Premium service required)

product.name: Push Button Lever Lock
product.keywords: Yale, real, living, door, lever, lock, push, button, YRL210, entry, zwave, battery

step1.text: Install the lock as instructed in the printed manual and change the master PIN so that it is 5 or more numbers long. Do not use your Iris PIN as a master PIN.

step2.text: Enter the master PIN then press #. The Yale logo will turn blue. Next press 7 and then press # again.

step3.text: Press '1 #' to add the lock to Iris. The lock will announce its success and the Smart hub will beep. To more easily manage who has PIN access to your locks, create a new Iris contact (Premium service required)

product.name: Push Button Deadbolt
product.keywords: Yale, real, living, door, deadbolt, lock, keypad, push, button, YRD220, entry, zwave, battery

step1.text: Install the lock as instructed in the printed manual and change the master PIN so that it is 5 or more numbers long. Do not use your Iris PIN as a master PIN.

step2.text: Enter the master PIN then press #. The Yale logo will turn blue. Next press 7 and then press # again.

step3.text: Press '1 #' to add the lock to Iris. The lock will announce its success and the Smart hub will beep. To more easily manage who has PIN access to your locks, create a new Iris contact (Premium service required)

product.name: Security Camera
product.keywords: Sercom, Sercomm, Iris, camera, video, picture, stream, streaming, record, recording, wifi, wi-fi, ethernet, wireless, night, vision, HD, high, definition, 720p, motion, PIR, IR, indoor, 8221, RC8221

step1.text: Iris needs to first setup your camera before you can use it wirelessly. Connect the camera to a network port on your router using the supplied Ethernet cable, before you plug it into an outlet.

step2.text: Now plug the camera into a power outlet using the supplied power cord. The Hub will beep when the camera is found (this may take up to 5 minutes). Once Iris installation is complete click the devices menu and select the camera to make it wireless.

product.name: Outdoor Security Camera
product.keywords: Sercom, Sercomm, Iris, camera, video, picture, stream, streaming, record, recording, wifi, wi-fi, ip, ethernet, wireless, night, vision, hd, high, definition, 720p, motion, PIR, IR, outdoor, 821, OC821

step1.text: Iris needs to first setup your camera before you can use it wirelessly. Connect the camera to a network port on your router using the supplied Ethernet cable, before you plug it into an outlet.

step2.text: Now plug the camera into a power outlet using the supplied power cord. The Hub will beep when the camera is found (this may take up to 5 minutes). Once Iris installation is complete click the devices menu and select the camera to make it wireless.

product.name: Electric Water Heater Controller
product.keywords: Energy, Smart, Water, Heater, Whirlpool, AO, Smith

step1.text: Install the water heater as instructed in the printed guide. Wait until the connection LED shows solid green.

step2.text: Wait until the connection LED shows solid green. Make a note of the water heater ID that is shown on the control panel sticker. 12 character code printed on the wifi module and also in the user guide (sticker on the cover).

step3.text: Enter the ID you noted above. Press 'Find'. Model and serial number are optional. You may record here to assist customer service later.

step4.text: INPUTS REQUIRED: ID Number. Model, Serial Number; BUTTON: Find

product.name: USB 3G Modem
product.keywords: Verizon, Notavel, USB, modem, 3G, GRPS, cellular, connect, internet, hub, backup, USB760

step1.text: Turn the smart hub on its side. Push the rear cover backwards and lift it off. The hub must be connected to broadband for the installation to complete.

step2.text: Slide the cellular modem into the USB slot inside the hub. Next replace the hub cover. If you have a Smart Meter Link then you will need an USB splitter.

step3.text: Click the 'find modem' button above. You must not remove or reinsert the modem while the hub is searching for it.

step5.text: Click 'OK' below and then click 'continue', then click 'Home' to return to the dashboard. Wait for a popup message with more instructions to be displayed. It may take a couple of minutes.

product.name: Garage Door Controller
product.keywords: Genie, Alladin, garage, door, opener, takeover, ip, wifi, wi-fi, ipcd, controller, barrier, security, lock

step1.text: Install the Genie Garage Door Opener as instructed in the printed device guide.

step2.text: Once you've completed these instructions, your Genie Garage Door Opener should be showing a green LED and is now ready to be paired to Iris. Make a note of the Genie Door Controller Module 12 Digit ID that is shown on the rear of the device.

step3.text: Enter the 12 Digit ID in the box above and select 'find'. If you require any assistance with this, please call 1-855-469-IRIS

step4.text: INPUTS REQUIRED: ID Number; BUTTON: Find

product.name: Voice Assistant
product.keywords: ivee, voice , cloud, wi-fi, wifi, ip

product.name: Indoor Camera
product.keywords: Blink, camera, video, picture, stream, streaming, record, recording, wifi, wi-fi, ip, ethernet, wireless, night, vision, hd, high, definition, 720p, motion, PIR, IR, battery, indoor

product.name: Smart Meter USB
product.keywords: MMB, zigbee, rapid, SE, smart, meter, electricity, monitoring, USB

step1.text: Turn the smart hub on its side. Push the rear cover backwards and lift it off.

step2.text: Slide the Smart Meter Link into the USB slot inside the hub then replace the rear cover. Make sure that the power and network cables are connected. If you have a cellular modem you may need a powered USB hub.

step3.text: Click the 'Find Smart Meter Link' button above. Once the Smart Meter Link has been installed note the MAC Address and installation Code. You'll need these to register the service with your power company. This information is also available on the manage device page for the Smart Meter Link.

step4.text: INPUTS REQUIRED: MAC Address, Installation Code; BUTTON: Find Smart Meter Link

step5.text: Select your power company. Click 'Register' and follow the instructions in the window that opens. Once registered click 'OK' below. Iris will send you an email once your power company has enabled the connection. The amount of time this will take depends on your power company and could be a few days.

step6.text: INPUTS REQUIRED: Power Company (drop down that includes only SCE); BUTTON: Register

step1.text: To add a Smart Meter you must first install an Iris Smart Meter Link and then ask your Power Company to enable the connection to Iris. If you've not already done this then click 'OK' and follow the instructions on the Smart Meter Link page.

step2.text: Iris will send you an email once you have completed step 1. Once you have received that email return to this page. Your meter will then be added to Iris.

product.name: Pet Door
product.keywords: PetSafe, door, entry, lock, dog, cat, zigbee, battery

step1.text: Remove 2 screws and lift off the battery cover.

step2.text: Insert batteries checking the correct orientation and replace the cover.

step3.text: The blue 'Link' light on the Pet Door will flash until it has paired successfully and then the hub will beep. Only one pet door may be added to your Iris system.

product.name: Blind Controller
product.keywords: blinds, shades, springs, bali, zwave, battery

step1.text: Connect and power the blinds controller as described in the printed instructions. Note only controller may be added to your Iris system, however, you can install multiple window blinds using a single blinds controller.

step2.text: Press the left arrow to display 'Z-Wave options' select it by pressing the center button. Use the arrows to find 'base node'. Press the center button to select it.

step3.text: Use the arrows to select 'base node include' and then press the center button. Upon pairing the controller will read "base include success" and the hub will beep.

step1.text: Ensure that you have paired your window blind controller with Iris. If you have not done this click 'ok' below and select the blinds controller icon.

step2.text: Pair your window blinds with the controller according to the printed instructions included with the controller. Make a note of the channel numbers.

step3.text: Use the arrow buttons to find 'Z-Wave options' select it by pressing the center button. Next use the arrow buttons to find 'virtual node' and select it with the center button. Use the arrows to find 'virtual node include'. Select it by pressing the center button.

step4.text: Use the arrows to find the virtual node number that matches the channel number noted in step 2. Press the center button to select it. Upon pairing the hub will beep and the controller will read "Include success". Repeat this steps for each blind you wish to pair.

product.name: Range Extender
product.keywords: AlertMe, Iris, indoor, range, signal, extender, zigbee, zwave, REP901

step1.text: Plug the Range Extender into an outlet that is no more than 10 feet from your hub in order to pair it (you can move it after pairing).

step2.text: The light on the front of the Range Extender will flash until it has been paired to Iris. Once this occurs (the Hub will beep), feel free to move the Range Extender to your preferred outlet. Some devices may need to be removed and re-paired (using the Devices menu) to automatically connect to the range extender.
